mapper.insert: insert into af_comment(article_id, user_id, comment_content, comment_root_id, comment_type, to_user_id) values (#{articleId}, #{userId}, #{commentContent}, #{commentRootId}, #{commentType}, #{toUserId})
insert into af_comment_like(comment_id, user_id, article_id) values (#{commentId}, #{userId}, #{articleId})

insert into af_questions(questions_title, questions_content, questions_state, questions_like_count, user_id, is_del, community_id, create_time ) values (#{questionsTitle}, #{questionsContent}, #{questionsState}, #{questionsLikeCount}, #{userId}, #{isDel}, #{communityId}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE af_comment SET comment_like_count = comment_like_count + 1 WHERE comment_id = #{commentId} AND comment_like_count >= 0
mapper.select: select c.comment_id, c.article_id, c.comment_content, c.user_id, c.to_user_id, c.comment_root_id, c.comment_like_count, c.comment_type, c.create_time, u.avatar, u.nickName from af_comment c left join sys_user u on c.user_id = u.id where c.article_id = #{articleId}
select distinct * from af_comment_like where user_id = #{userId} and article_id=#{articleId}
